Described Disease.MONDO: (MONDO term for the disease from the database)

Experiment Method.Readout type: (type of readout mentioned in the literature)

Readout description.Conclusion: (conclusion about the variant from the literature)
Readout description.Molecular Effect: (molecular effect of the variant from the literature, such as loss-of-function, partial loss-of-function, gain-of-function, dominant-negative, no effect or N.D.)
Readout description.Result Description: (description of the experimental result for the variant)

Biological replicates.Description: (description of biological replicates from the literature)

Technical replicates.Description: (description of technical replicates from the literature)

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: (whether a basic positive control was set up)
Basic positive control.Description: (description of the positive control from the literature)

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: (whether a basic negative control was set up)
Basic negative control.Description: (description of the negative control from the literature)

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: (whether validation controls for pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants were included)
Validation controls P/LP.Counts: (number of validation controls for pathogenic/likely pathogenic variants)

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: (whether validation controls for benign/likely benign variants were included)
Validation controls B/LB.Counts: (number of validation controls for benign/likely benign variants)

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: (description of the statistical analysis method used in the experimental protocol)

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: (threshold for normal results in the literature)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: (threshold for abnormal results in the literature)

Approved assay.Approved assay: (whether the experimental protocol used in the literature is generally used for studying this disease)
